version_description:
- Added wind history, rainfall forecast, and flash flood risk graphics
- Added GEOCOLOR satellite filter band
- Improved app performance

Previous Update: 1.0.7 

- Updated GOES-16 Satellite Data (fixed satellite imagery display speed)
- Added NHC Forecast & Public Advisories (text reports)

Please continue sending feedback to mwnbdc@gmail.com. Thank you for the support!

+ Added over 60 new hurricane tracking products for the 2020 hurricane season:
  - Full screen, high resolution satellite imagery 
  - 16-day Weather Forecast Models 
     (GFS / GEFS / NAEFS)
  - High Resolution Weather Simulations 
  - HMON & HWRF Hurricane Forecast Models

In total, there are now over 100+ hurricane / weather tracking products to help you stay informed during hurricane season. The new features are available through a Pro Subscription. 

Note: All 40+ tracking products seen in the app preview video & screenshots do NOT require a Pro Subscription.

+ Fixed a few minor bugs

Thank you for the positive feedback!

In total, there are now over 100+ hurricane / weather tracking products to help you stay informed during hurricane season. The new features are available through a Pro Subscription.
